name: Fiddle Leaf Fig
description: The Fiddle Leaf Fig is a popular houseplant known for its large, violin-shaped leaves. It thrives in bright, indirect light and requires moderate watering.

name: Monstera Deliciosa
description: Monstera Deliciosa, or the Swiss Cheese Plant, is loved for its unique, perforated leaves. It's a low-maintenance plant that does well in partial shade and moderate watering.

name: Peace Lily
description: The Peace Lily is a graceful indoor plant with white blooms. It purifies the air and thrives in low to moderate light, making it perfect for any room.

name: Snake Plant
description: Known for its striking, upright leaves, the Snake Plant is a hardy, low-maintenance plant that tolerates low light and infrequent watering.

name: Spider Plant
description: The Spider Plant is an easy-to-grow indoor plant that produces small, white flowers. It's adaptable to various lighting conditions and helps purify the air.

name: Aloe Vera
description: Aloe Vera is a succulent plant with thick, fleshy leaves that contain soothing gel. It prefers bright light and minimal watering, making it a low-maintenance option.

name: Boston Fern
description: The Boston Fern is known for its lush, feathery fronds. It prefers a humid environment and indirect light, ideal for adding greenery to bathrooms or kitchens.

name: ZZ Plant
description: The ZZ Plant is a resilient indoor plant with waxy, dark green leaves. It can tolerate low light and requires very little water, making it perfect for beginners.

name: English Ivy
description: English Ivy is a versatile plant with small, glossy leaves that can climb or trail. It does well in indirect light and requires regular watering to stay lush.

name: Chinese Money Plant
description: The Chinese Money Plant is loved for its round, coin-shaped leaves. It enjoys bright, indirect light and moderate watering, and it’s said to bring good fortune.

name: Pothos
description: Pothos is an easy-to-care-for vine with heart-shaped leaves. It adapts well to low light and occasional watering, making it perfect for new plant owners.

name: Calathea
description: Calathea plants are known for their vibrant, patterned leaves. They require low to moderate light and high humidity, making them ideal for indoor environments.

name: Philodendron
description: Philodendrons are tropical plants with large, green leaves. They are easy to grow, adaptable to low light, and require moderate watering to thrive.

name: Bonsai Tree
description: Bonsai Trees are miniature trees that require regular pruning and care. They add a unique, artistic touch to any space and thrive in bright light.

name: Bird of Paradise
description: The Bird of Paradise is a striking plant with large, tropical leaves. It requires bright light and occasional watering, adding a bold touch to interiors.

name: Rubber Plant
description: The Rubber Plant is known for its large, glossy leaves. It’s low-maintenance, tolerates low light, and prefers moderate watering to thrive.

name: Majesty Palm
description: The Majesty Palm has feathery fronds that add an exotic touch to interiors. It requires bright, indirect light and high humidity to flourish.

name: Lucky Bamboo
description: Lucky Bamboo is an easy-to-grow plant that can thrive in water. It is said to bring good luck and prefers indirect light and occasional water changes.

name: Lavender
description: Lavender is a fragrant herb with purple flowers. It prefers bright light and well-drained soil, making it perfect for sunny spots indoors or outdoors.

name: Mint Plant
description: Mint is a refreshing herb that grows quickly and can be used in cooking. It does well in bright light and regular watering, thriving in small pots or gardens.

name: Rosemary
description: Rosemary is an aromatic herb with needle-like leaves. It thrives in bright light and well-drained soil, adding flavor to culinary dishes and beauty to any garden.

name: Basil
description: Basil is a popular culinary herb with a sweet aroma. It requires bright light and regular watering, perfect for growing in kitchens or small indoor gardens.

name: Orchid
description: Orchids are delicate flowers known for their beauty and elegance. They thrive in indirect light and require a specific watering routine to bloom.

name: Cactus Variety
description: Cacti are resilient plants that require minimal water and lots of sunlight. They come in various shapes and sizes, perfect for adding a touch of desert charm.

name: Jade Plant
description: The Jade Plant is a succulent with thick, round leaves. It is low-maintenance, prefers bright light, and is thought to bring prosperity to its owner.

name: Umbrella Tree
description: The Umbrella Tree has lush, green foliage and thrives in bright, indirect light. It’s low-maintenance and adds a tropical vibe to indoor spaces.

name: Dracaena
description: Dracaena plants are low-maintenance and come in various shapes and sizes. They tolerate low light and infrequent watering, making them ideal for beginners.

name: Hoya
description: The Hoya, or Wax Plant, has thick, waxy leaves and occasional star-shaped flowers. It requires indirect light and moderate watering to thrive.

name: Fuchsia
description: Fuchsia plants have vibrant, drooping flowers that add color to indoor or outdoor gardens. They prefer partial shade and regular watering.

name: Chamomile
description: Chamomile is a calming herb with daisy-like flowers. It does well in bright light and moderate watering, often used to make soothing teas.
